item.dc:creator: @elite_azn elite azn
item.description:
@elite_azn wrote:

If this is in the wrong section please tell me, but I just thought that since is says:

Talk about programming algorithms, programming tools, techniques and books here, [b]and post your code samples[/b].
I'm posting a code sample :P

Well here it is:

[code]/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Scenario Script for 300 - it’s just like 80% of it, I couldn’t make it exact lol
Author: Adrian or elite azn
Version: 0.1.0

Comments: This script is for the 300 scenario which I am creating.

Suggestions/Comments/Bug Reports/Questions/etc: sir_acealot_6594@hotmail.com

Outline: This is my version of 300 with a script, the script isn’t enirely complete
and to finish 0.1.0 I just need to add the ints for the persian archer ID’s.
But anyway, this has the archer waves which haven’t been tested yet, infact, this whole
script hasn’t been tested yet but I will test it before 0.1.1. The archers will then walk
away HOPEFULLY! to stop them just attacking and I have already made the map with the
bonuses and moded the names and all. This has timers for the different things that happen.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

scenario
{

static int S = 1;
static int P1 = 2;
static int P2 = 3;
static int p3 = 4;

static int persian_archer_rally_x = 120
static int persian_archer_rally_y = 62
static int persian_archer2_rally_x = 124
static int persian_archer2_rally_y = 54
static int persian_archer3_rally_x = 119
static int persian_archer3_rally_y = 49

//need to get all of the persian archer ID's
//reserved space
//reserved space
//reserved space
//reserved space
//reserved space
//reserved space
//reserved space
//reserved space
//reserved space

//reserved for the horses to move towards the spartans

labels {

}

run_once { //Enter any triggers that you want to fire as soon as the scenario loads.
set_nation_name(“Greeks”, “Sparta”);
set_nation_name(“Inca”, “Persia”);
set_nation_name(“Aztecs”, “Persia”);
set_nation_name(“Bantu”, “Persia”);
disable_type(“Nuclear Missile”); //This trigger disables any unit or structure so it can not be used in the game.
disable_type(“Nuclear ICBM”); //In between the “” is the unit/structure you want to disable.
disable_type(“Major City”); //Note that after every trigger is a ; (Remember to include these!)
disable_type(“Small City”);
disable_type(“Large City”);
disable_type(“University”);
disable_type(“Market”);
disable_type(“Library”);
disable_type(“Temple”);
disable_type(“Missile Silo”);
disable_type(“Airbase”);
disable_type(“SAM Installation”);
disable_type(“Pyramids”);
disable_type(“Colossus”);
disable_type(“Terra Cotta Army”);
disable_type(“Colosseum”);
disable_type(“Temple of Tikal”);
disable_type(“Porcelain Tower”);
disable_type(“Angkor Wat”);
disable_type(“Versailles”);
disable_type(“Statue of Liberty”);
disable_type(“Kremlin”);
disable_type(“Taj Mahal”);
disable_type(“Eiffel Tower”);
disable_type(“Supercollider”);
disable_type(“Space Program”);
disable_tech( 1,“Allegiance”); //This trigger disables any technology in the game.
disable_tech( 2,“Allegiance”);
disable_type(“Citizen”);

buildings_gather_disable();

//blurb
set_victory_message(“The outnumbered Greeks and Spartan’s have won! Xerxes will be most dissapointent.”);
set_defeat_message(“Ambush! Persian cowards can’t win without bowmen!”);
pop_dialog(“It is 480 BC, and King Leonidas is defending the narrow pass of Thermopolae Against a massive army of Persians. Approx. 1,000,000. The Second King of Sparta will send an army of 4,900 Heavily Armoured Greeks in soon, just hold out!”);
}

set_timer(“PersianArrowLaunch1”,180); //Trigger (seconds) for 3 minutes for the first Persian Arrow volley.
set_timer(“PersianArrowLaunch2”,540); //Trigger (seconds) for 9 minutes for the second Persian Arrow volley.
set_timer(“GreekReInforceMents”,600); //This will set the reinforcement timer to 10 mins.
set_timer(“MoveArchers1”, 185); // this makes it fair, so the arrows don’t keep attacking
set_timer(“MoveArchers2”, 545); // this makes it fair, so the arrows don’t keep attacking
set_timer(“MoveArchers3”, 545); // this makes it fair, so the arrows don’t keep attacking
set_timer(“PersianArrowLaunch3”, 540); //whoops left it out
//reserved for the horse movement timer which should be 15 secs after the archerlaunch1

trigger Briefing () //This has no requirements…will kick in once game starts
{

add_objective( “The 2nd Spartan King must survive in Sparta”, “king”, “null.wav” );
add_objective( “Defeat all Persians”, “attack”, “null.wav” );

}

//Main script body.
//Add triggers and other commands to be executed each game frame here.
//Use Edit->Insert Trigger Function to select from the list of available functions
//Use Edit->Insert Trigger Block to add a blank trigger block.
//See ./scenario/sample_script.bhs for additional documentation

//this is the trigger for the horses wave

trigger king_dies ( unit_killed( 1,145 ))
{
popup_dialog( “Sparta’s Second King has been slain and the Spartan citizens are vulnerable to any attack from this massive persian army!” );
defeat(1);
{

deafeat(1); //this will happen when a team loses the game
popup_dialog( “Sparta’s Second King has been slain and the Spartan citizens are vulnerable to any attack from this massive persian army!” );

}

trigger PersianArrowLaunch1 (timer_expired(“PersianArrowLauch1”)) //This block’s requirement is for a timer to expire.
{

print_msg(“Shields up Spartan’s!!”); //This message appears after the timer expires.
unit_attack_order(2,18,1,2015); //This trigger orders a single unit to attack a certain unit/structure.
unit_attack_order(2,21,1,2021); //eg. This trigger is to make unit “7” from team “2” to attack team "1"s structure “2026”.
unit_attack_order(2,24,1,2034); //To find out a units/structures ID number you have to put your mouse over it in the Scenario Editor.
unit_attack_order(2,27,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,33,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,36,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,39,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,42,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,45,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,543,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,546,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,549,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,552,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,48,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,51,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,54,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,57,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,555,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,558,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,561,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,564,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,567,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,570,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,573,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,576,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,579,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,582,1,2015);

}

trigger PersianArrowLaunch2 (timer_expired(“PersianArrowLauch2”)) //This block’s requirement is for a timer to expire.
{

print_msg(“Ambush!”); //This message appears after the timer expires.
unit_attack_order(2,0,1,2015); //This trigger orders a single unit to attack a certain unit/structure.
unit_attack_order(2,3,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,6,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,9,1,2015);

}

trigger PersianArrowLaunch3 (timer_expired(“PersianArrowLaunch3”))
{

print_msg(“Ambush!”);
unit_attack_order(2,2002,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,2008,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,2003,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,2004,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,2007,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,2006,1,2015);
unit_attack_order(2,2005,1,2015);

}

trigger GreekReInforcements (timer_expired(“GreekReInforcements”)) //This block’s requirement is for a timer to expire.
{

print_msg(“At last, the Greek reinforcements!.”); //This message appears after the timer expires.
create_unit_in_group(1,93,165,“Armoured Hopolite”,50); //Creates multiple units in a group.
create_unit_in_group(1,97,165,“Armoured Hopolite”,50); //Creates groups of units
create_unit_in_group(1,102,162,“Armoured Horse Hopolite”,30); //Creates groups of units

}

// Moving the Archers back

trigger persian_archer_rally( ) {

clear_group( P3 );
// move peasant archers + personals
for( i = 0; i < num_type( P3, "Persian PP" ); i++ ) {
  unit_id = find_unit( P3, "Persian Peasant Bowmen" ); 
  add_to_group( P3, unit_id );
}

// move elite archers + royals
for( i = 0; i < num_unit_category( P3, "Persian ER" ); i++ ) {
  unit_id = find_unit( P3, "Persian ER" );
  add_to_group( P3, unit_id );
}

// move support
unit_move_order( P3, persian_peasent_archer_id, persian_archer_rally_x, persian_archer_rally_y );
unit_move_order( P3, persian_elite_archer_id, persian_archer2_rally_x, persian_archer2_rally_y );
unit_move_order( P3, persian_royal_archer_id, persian_archer3_rallyx, persian_archer3_rally_y );
add_to_group( P3, persian_peasent_archer_id );
add_to_group( P3, persian_elite_archer_id );
add_to_group( P3, persian_personal_archer_id );

//reserved for the horse movement coords
[/code]
